body.p: One of Bela’s nine sons, a member of Benjamin’s tribe (1 Chr 8:4). Ahoah’s descendants were called Ahohites, and two of them were among King David’s most effective warriors: Dodo (“son of Ahohi,” 2 Sm 23:9; spelled “Dodai” in 1 Chr 27:4) and Zalmon the Ahohite (2 Sm 23:28; called “Ilai” in 1 Chr 11:29).
